text: Hello! Are you familier with non government organizations?
I think i am but it depends what type you are talking about.
I am talking about one i particular. It is called Save the Children. Are you familiar with this organization?
I have heard of it and have seen their many commercials.
That is great! Have you ever made a donation to this organization?
I have not but i have always wanted to but never had the opportunity or time to. Have you?
I have not either. And honestly I have a strong belief in this organization. I recently had a daughter who is now a month old. And I could not imagine what I would do if I was unable to help her.
Yeah i can't imagine either. It is a hard life in this world.
Absolutely it is! I was actually thinking of donating some of my bonus from this task to this organization.
That's nice, how much are you thinking of?
I was thinking .30-.50 The task has taken some time to complete so it is fair for me to be compensated. But I think this organization needs every little bit and hopefully others will feel the same.
yeah, i think it is a great opportunity and time that i get to do my part
That sounds great! I feel we are both thinking the same here! If you are given the opportunity to donate some of your bonus to this organization what do you think is a fair amount?
I was thinking a good amount for me will be $1
That is very generous of you. Good for you. I know it always makes me feel good when giving to organizations like this.
Yeah, well its not everyday that i get to give so i better make the best of it
That is a great way to think about it. And since the money is not yet in your hands it makes it that much easier to give a little.
Am i able to donate directly or how does that work?
At the end you will be asked if you want to donate any of your $2 bonus. The research team will then collect all funds donated and send them to Save the Children
Nice, so i guess i can donate now, right?
Yes you can. As soon as you or myself click the done button. Thank you for your time and enjoy the rest of your evening!
Thanks so much, you too
